booking_meta_title: Book Your Welcome Class | Farray's Center Barcelona
booking_meta_description: Book your welcome class at the Barcelona dance school. Over 25 styles: salsa, bachata, hip hop, ballet and more. Exclusive Farray® Method.
booking_subtitle: Choose your style, select a class and confirm your attendance
booking_subtitle_extended: Select your class, complete the form and come experience Farray's in person
booking_class_empty: No classes available for this style
booking_class_error: Error loading classes. Please try again.
booking_modal_no_description: No description available for this class.
booking_no_classes_match: No classes match the selected filters
booking_loading_please_wait: One moment please, loading available classes...
booking_error_phone_invalid: Invalid phone number for selected country
booking_consent_terms_required: You must accept the general terms and conditions
booking_consent_terms_note: (Includes booking confirmation and reminders via WhatsApp/email, and potential image use in promotional material. To opt-out of photos/videos, notify reception or email info@farrayscenter.com)
booking_consent_age: I confirm that I am 16 years or older, or have authorization from my legal guardian
booking_consent_age_required: You must confirm your age to continue
booking_consent_privacy: I have read and accept the
booking_consent_privacy_required: You must accept the privacy policy
booking_consent_heels: I understand and accept that this class is performed in high heels. I commit to using appropriate footwear and assume responsibility for my safety
booking_consent_heels_required: You must accept the high heels conditions
booking_consent_marketing: I agree to receive commercial communications about classes, events and promotions
booking_consent_norefund: I understand that bookings are non-refundable and that I must cancel at least 24h in advance
booking_consent_image: I authorize the use of my image in photos and videos taken during classes for promotional purposes on social media and website
booking_success_message: Your spot is secured. You will receive a WhatsApp and email with all the details.
booking_success_reminder: We will remind you 24h before the class
booking_success_lang_note: Confirmation and reminder messages are sent in Spanish
booking_calendar_description: Dance class with {instructor} at Farray's Center
booking_error_message: An error occurred. Please try again.
booking_error_generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
booking_error_timeout: The request took too long. Please try again.
booking_error_required_fields: Please fill in all required fields
booking_error_heels_consent_required: Please accept the high heels class conditions
booking_error_phone: Please enter a valid phone number
booking_error_name_min: Name must be at least 2 characters
booking_error_phone_min: Phone must be at least 6 digits
booking_error_boundary_message: An error occurred while loading the booking system. Please try again.
booking_unsaved_warning: You have unsaved data. Are you sure you want to leave?
booking_legal_responsible: Data Controller: Farray's International Dance Center S.L.
booking_legal_purpose: Purpose: Manage your booking and send you information about the class.
booking_legal_rights: Rights: Access, rectification, erasure, restriction, portability and objection.
booking_legal_info: More information in our privacy policy.
booking_exit_intent_title: Can't find what you're looking for?
booking_exit_intent_description: We have over 25 dance styles available. Maybe another style suits you better.
booking_exit_intent_description_personal: We have over 25 dance styles and flexible schedules. Maybe another time or style works better for you.
booking_no_classes_found: No classes available with these filters
